page.title: 11Tourism
page.content: Three of our squares border onto the Atlantic Ocean and this is atremendous aattraction to holiday makers.Large sandy beaches,waves for surfing,coastal walks,majestic cliffs,beautiful views.This is what this stretch of coast line has to offer. This area stretches from Widemouth to Upton,the former originating in 1905 and the latter in 1912.Only one cottage existed prior to this-Salt House-on the cliff edge,where pans of sea water were collected and left to evaporate and leave the sea salt. This area is basically bungalows-retirement homes,built in blocks of 25-30 at a time in intervals of 10 years.
